Introduction
This topic contains information on preparing a rating decision addressing IU, including
requirement for deciding all IU claims
addressing disabilities within scope of the IU claim
information to include in the rating decision
reasons for denying IU claims
formally denying IU
deferring reasonably raised IU claims
when an IU evaluation is considered moot
, and
granting temporary or permanent 100-percent evaluations with IU
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section C - Individual Unemployability (IU) Rating and Decision Review
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section C
